page.title: 09SARAH PEARCE OF AMMANFORD
page.content: Every weekday I get up at 6.30. I shower and dress by 7.30. Then I join my sister Anne, for a light breakfast. We usually watch TV-AM until 8.30 when it's time to leave for school. I am in the 3rd year and Anne's in the 4th year in the A.V.C.S. School is just down the road from home and so we arrive in time for the 8.40 bell. We have 8 lessons a day, 2 before morning break, 3 before and after lunch. Although there is a canteen I always go home for lunch. School finishes at 3.05. My favourite lesson is English. I'm not very fond of History. Every Tuesday I attend the local Urdd Aelwyd and on a Wednesday I have Drama and Elocution lessons. I am allowed to watch only 2 hours of TV. each night. When I leave school I want to be a solicitor,like my father.
